name: Technical Documentation
description: Generates clear, maintainable technical documentation including API references, architecture overviews, and READMEs from code analysis.

examples.prompt: Document the public API for this REST service
examples.expected_behavior: Analyzes route handlers and types to produce endpoint reference with request/response schemas, auth requirements, and examples

examples.prompt: Write an architecture overview for this project
examples.expected_behavior: Reads the codebase structure, identifies key components and data flow, and produces a concise architecture document with diagrams
